sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Box, Grid, Typography, Card, CardContent, Divider, Paper, Stepper, Step, StepLabel, StepContent } from '@mui/material'; import { Info as InfoIcon, Business as BusinessIcon, Code as CodeIcon, ArrowForward as ArrowForwardIcon, AccountTree as AccountTreeIcon, FindInPage as FindInPageIcon, DataObject as DataObjectIcon, Psychology as PsychologyIcon, AutoFixHigh as AutoFixHighIcon, Flag as FlagIcon, ReceiptLong as ReceiptLongIcon, Category as CategoryIcon, SmartToy as SmartToyIcon, FactCheck as FactCheckIcon } from '@mui/icons-material'; const Summary = () => { // Get current date for the refresh time const currentDate = new Date(); const refreshDate = `${currentDate.toLocaleDateString()} ${currentDate.toLocaleTimeString()}`; return ( Supply Chain Analytics Platform {/* Tool Summary */} About This Tool The Supply Chain Analytics Platform is a comprehensive solution designed to identify, validate, and recover financial losses throughout the supply chain lifecycle. It combines advanced analytics with machine learning to flag potential risks early in the process and validate discrepancies when supplier charge sheets are received. Potential Risk Flagger Proactively identifies risky transactions throughout the supply chain lifecycle by analyzing patterns and anomalies based on business policies and historical data. It flags potential issues before they result in financial losses. Discrepancy Validator Validates supplier charge sheets against purchase orders and historical data to determine whether claimed discrepancies are legitimate or potentially recoverable. It helps identify significant cost recovery opportunities. {/* Architecture Diagrams */} Architecture Overview {/* Potential Risk Flagger Architecture */} Potential Risk Flagger Architecture ( )}> Data Sources Metadata & Business Policies Business docs, policies, and historical discrepancy patterns ( )}> LLM Processing AI-Generated Analysis Scripts LLM interprets business rules and generates analysis code ( )}> Real-time Analysis Transaction Data Processing Live supply chain data flows through generated scripts ( )}> Output Risk Flagging Identification of high-risk transactions for proactive intervention {/* Visual Architecture Diagram */} Business Policies LLM Processing Generated Scripts Risk Flagging Dashboard Proactive Risk Management {/* Discrepancy Validator Architecture */} Discrepancy Validator Architecture ( )}> Input Sources Supplier Charge Sheets PO data and reasons for supplier charges ( )}> Initial Processing Reason Clustering LLM groups similar reasons into semantic clusters ( )}> Code Generation Validation Logic Creation LLM generates specialized code for each reason bucket ( )}> Analysis Reconciliation & Validation Data flows through validation scripts to identify recoverable charges {/* Visual Architecture Diagram */} Charge Sheets & POs Reason Clustering Validation Logic Financial Recovery Dashboard Cost Recovery Opportunities {/* Metadata and Author Info */} Author: Infyslate Last Refresh: {refreshDate} ); }; export default Summary;
